body_html:
I'm working with the tensorflow r1.4 branch. When I CMake configure

cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:/Users/Kevin/dev/swigwin-3.0.12/swig.exe -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=python.exe -DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:/ProgramData/Anaconda3/libs/python36.lib -DPYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR=C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\include -DNUMPY_INCLUDE_DIR=C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\Lib\site-packages\numpy\core\include -Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -DCUDNN_HOME="C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0" -Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX

and run

MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj

I get the error

"C:\Users\Kevin\dev\tensorflow-r1.4\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
(PostBuildEvent target) ->
  C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft.Cpp\v4.0\V140\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(133,5): error MSB3073: The command "setlocal\r [C:\Users\Kevin\dev\tensorflow-r1.4\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj]
C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft.Cpp\v4.0\V140\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(133,5): error MSB3073: "C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E copy C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/setup.py C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/tf_python/\r [C:\Users\Kevin\dev\tensorflow-r1.4\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj]
...
C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft.Cpp\v4.0\V140\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(133,5): error MSB3073: :VCEnd" exited with code 9009. [C:\Users\Kevin\dev\tensorflow-r1.4\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj]
    7016 Warning(s)
    1 Error(s)
Time Elapsed 03:53:21.42

CMakeOutput.log
CMakeError.log

body:
I'm working with the tensorflow r1.4 branch.   When I CMake configure

```
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:/Users/Kevin/dev/swigwin-3.0.12/swig.exe -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=python.exe -DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:/ProgramData/Anaconda3/libs/python36.lib -DPYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR=C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\include -DNUMPY_INCLUDE_DIR=C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\Lib\site-packages\numpy\core\include -Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -DCUDNN_HOME="C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0" -Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX 
```
and run
 
`MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj`

I get the error

```
"C:\Users\Kevin\dev\tensorflow-r1.4\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
(PostBuildEvent target) ->
  C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft.Cpp\v4.0\V140\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(133,5): error MSB3073: The command "setlocal\r [C:\Users\Kevin\dev\tensorflow-r1.4\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj]
C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft.Cpp\v4.0\V140\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(133,5): error MSB3073: "C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E copy C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/setup.py C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/tf_python/\r [C:\Users\Kevin\dev\tensorflow-r1.4\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj]
...
C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft.Cpp\v4.0\V140\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(133,5): error MSB3073: :VCEnd" exited with code 9009. [C:\Users\Kevin\dev\tensorflow-r1.4\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj]
    7016 Warning(s)
    1 Error(s)
Time Elapsed 03:53:21.42
```

[CMakeOutput.log](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1419162/CMakeOutput.log)
[CMakeError.log](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1419163/CMakeError.log)
